Posts.Content: just a message to ladies to let them know i am a vulvar cancer survivor. its been 18 months ago. my paps were normal but i trouble with bouts of itching and then i discovered a small lump in my opening in the vulva area. more hten anything i just want to incouage women to do self examines on them selves because this is only about 5% of cancer in women so alot of drs don't examine this area when doing a pap. thanks
Posts.Title: vulvar cancer
